alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Fergus; Hill (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Fergus, central Blaine and eastern Hill Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 313 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northeast of Parker School to 18 miles northeast of Winifred. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harlem, Hays, Fort Belknap, Lodge Pole, Lloyd, Cleveland and Zurich. This includes Highway 2 between mile markers 408 and 440. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for central and north central Montana.
